2.title: Accreditation in progress
2.text:
1.Prepare an application for accreditation in the registry
2. Submit an application
3. Wait for the decision of the registry owner.

4.title: Accreditation suspended
4.text: The registry owner has temporarily excluded your company from the registry.
4.advice: Advice: Contact the registry owner or prepare a new application for accreditation.

5.title: Accreditation expired
5.advice: Advice: Prepare a new application for accreditation.

6.title: Your company has been excluded from the register

7.title: Your company has refused accreditation
7.advice: Advice: Prepare a new application to be accredited.

submit.title: Apply
submit.success_snack: The application has been sent for consideration

no_application.title: Your company did not fill out the application form for accreditation in the registry.
no_application.text:
Possible reasons:
  • • The application did not contain a questionnaire at the time of submission
  • • The registry owner accredited your company without submitting an application

not_accredited_in_related_error.title: Application submission unavailable
not_accredited_in_related_error.list_title: Complete the accreditation in the registries:
not_accredited_in_related_error.requirement: The requirement is specified by the registry owner in the “Prerequisite for Accreditation” section.

obsolete.title: Application is out of date
obsolete.text: The registry owner has updated the questionnaire. Update your application. Make sure that all blocks of the application are ready and repeat the action.

block_is_not_complete.title: Application form not completed
block_is_not_complete.text: Complete the questionnaire and repeat the action.

request_acceptance_closed.title: Application submission unavailable
request_acceptance_closed.text: Acceptance of applications has been completed.
request_acceptance_closed.notice: Have a questions? Contact the owner of the registry.

blocked.title: Application submission unavailable
blocked.text: Your company has been removed from the register. Refresh the page to see details.
